channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024061323
item.description:
Report X-2024061323

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: SADDLE BROOK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATLEY 8 KGS OF DRY ICE COOLING VANCOMYCIN USP 5 DEXINJ SOL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX DOES HAVE AN ORANGE STICKER INDICATING A FROZEN PRODUCT IS INSIDE DESTINED TO BE DELIVERED DIRECTLY TO THE HOSPITAL PHARMACY. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM SADDLEBROOK, NEW JERSEY USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER X69862, BAXTER CARDINAL FROZEN DC CPAD, 500 NEELYTOWN RD, MONTGOMERY NY 12549-2828.

item.description:

  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE INSIDE A BLACK TOTE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE OF ECOLAB SINK AND SURFACE CLEANER SANITIZER WAS FOUND 1/2 LEAKED. THE REMAINS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.

Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 56 g Amount in Package: 56 g

item.title: Report X-2024051817
item.description:
Report X-2024051817

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-18T15:12:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION 2 GLASS BOTTLE OF ISOPROPANOL ALCOHOL WAS FOUND TO BE CRACKED AND FULLY LEAKED OUT. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.
